meanings: Noun 화폐 주조용 은동(銀銅)[금동(金銅)], 그것으로 만든 화폐

vlive.korean: [XX의 또 다른 빌런 규민 등장!] 여기 이루미 씨 계실까요? [Kyumin, another villain of XX!] Is Rumi here? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 이 비주얼 이제 못 본다는 사실 컨펌 못 해... [엑스엑스(XX)] - 비하인드
vlive.english: [Kyumin, another villain of XX!] Is Rumi here?

vlive.korean: 육동찬 빌런~ Yook Dong Chan, villain. 듣기 View video VICTON : 깜짝부이앱
그럼 빌런 표정 한번 볼 수 있을까요? Will you put on a villain-like face? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#405. 아기태양신 (스페셜 DJ 위너 강승윤 with 이진혁)
vlive.english: Will you put on a villain-like face?

vlive.korean: 빌런 'Because I'm bad' - 'bad 빌런' 할 때 딱... Villain. "Because I'm bad". - He did it when saying "Bad villain". 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#405. 아기태양신 (스페셜 DJ 위너 강승윤 with 이진혁)
vlive.english: Villain. "Because I'm bad". - He did it when saying "Bad villain".

vlive.korean: 빌런 엑소? 방위대 엑소? 누굴 골라야 하죠? Villain EXO? Defense force EXO? Who should I pick? 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 붐보의 서재 - EP. 06 엑소 정규 6집 언박싱! (덕질 과몰입해서 이중자아 돼버린 붐보&보붐⁉️)
vlive.english: Villain EXO? Defense force EXO? Who should I pick?

examples.korean: At age 22, Schwarzenegger began to earn acting roles in films such as 'Stay Hungry' (1976) and 'The Villain' (1979). 발음듣기 슈왈제네거는 22세의 나이에 '스테이 헝그리' (1976), '빌런' (1979)과 같은 영화에서 연기를 하기 시작했다. Neungyule
examples.english: At age 22, Schwarzenegger began to earn acting roles in films such as 'Stay Hungry' (1976) and 'The Villain' (1979). 발음

examples.korean: Players battle the villains using Faith, Love, Truth, Joy, Patience and Forgiveness. 발음듣기 플레이어들은 믿음, 사랑, 진실, 기쁨, 인내와 용서로 빌런과 맞서 싸운다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 혜밍(yero****) Web Collection
examples.english: Players battle the villains using Faith, Love, Truth, Joy, Patience and Forgiveness. 발음

examples.korean: He often plays the part of the villain. 발음듣기 그는 자주 악당 역할[악역]을 연기한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He often plays the part of the villain. 발음

examples.korean: Industrialized nations are the real environmental villains. 발음듣기 산업 국가들이 진정 환경에 해를 끼치는 악한들이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Industrialized nations are the real environmental villains. 발음

examples.korean: In the first act, the villain insinuates himself into the household of the man he intends to kill. 발음듣기 맨 첫 행동으로, 악당은 자기가 살해하려는 남자의 집안사람들의 환심을 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the first act, the villain insinuates himself into the household of the man he intends to kill. 발음
